mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.property_project_id AS "propertyProject.id", a.building_id AS "building.id", a.house_id AS "house.id", a.room_id AS "room.id", a.rent_mode AS "rentMode", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.agreement_code AS "agreementCode", a.agreement_name AS "agreementName", a.start_date AS "startDate", a.expired_date AS "expiredDate", a.sign_date AS "signDate", a.ren_months AS "renMonths", a.deposit_months AS "depositMonths", a.agreement_date AS "agreementDate", a.deposit_amount AS "depositAmount", a.housing_rent AS "housingRent", a.agreement_status AS "agreementStatus", a.agreement_busi_status AS "agreementBusiStatus", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", u7.name AS "user.name", tp.project_name as "projectName", tb.building_name as "buildingBame", th.house_no as "houseNo", tm.room_no as "roomNo", at1.attachment_path as "depositAgreementFile", at3.attachment_path as "depositCustomerIDFile", at4.attachment_path as "depositOtherFile", a.data_source as "dataSource", tt.TENANT_NAME as "tenantName", tt.CELL_PHONE as "cellPhone"

LEFT JOIN sys_user u7 ON u7.id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN t_contract_tenant tct ON tct.DEPOSIT_AGREEMENT_ID = a.id AND tct.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' LEFT JOIN t_tenant tt on tt.id = tct.TENANT_ID and tt.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' left join t_property_project tp on a.property_project_id = tp.id left join t_building tb on a.building_id=tb.id left join t_house th on a.house_id=th.id left join t_room tm on a.room_id=tm.id left join t_attachment at1 on a.id=at1.deposit_agreem_id and at1.attachment_type='14' and at1.del_flag='0' left join t_attachment at3 on a.id=at3.deposit_agreem_id and at3.attachment_type='4' and at3.del_flag='0' left join t_attachment at4 on a.id=at4.deposit_agreem_id and at4.attachment_type='18' and at4.del_flag='0'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_rent_contract a WHERE (a.house_id = #{houseNo} or a.room_id = #{roomNo}) and a.del_flag='0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_deposit_agreement( id, property_project_id, building_id, house_id, room_id, rent_mode, user_id, agreement_code, agreement_name, start_date, expired_date, sign_date, ren_months, deposit_months, agreement_date, deposit_amount, housing_rent, agreement_status, agreement_busi_status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, data_source ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{propertyProject.id}, #{building.id}, #{house.id}, #{room.id}, #{rentMode}, #{user.id}, #{agreementCode}, #{agreementName}, #{startDate}, #{expiredDate}, #{signDate}, #{renMonths}, #{depositMonths}, #{agreementDate}, #{depositAmount}, #{housingRent}, #{agreementStatus}, #{agreementBusiStatus}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{dataSource} )
